string.value: When I passed by, #b#p1061013##k, someone I really never got to spoke with, looked like he had something to talk to me. Let's go and find out what he has to say to me.

#p1061013# was looking at #t4031447# very closely to see if I did anything to hurt him. I don't know what the deal is but he was scaring me. It makes me wonder why he is obsessed with this particular snail. I should find out by talking to #b#p1061013##k again.
#p1061013# told me what happened between him and Bob. It's amazing that a simple snail actually tried to save human being... Those little monsters we hunt aren't really little at all...

Hi... What's your business? I am Gwin, the traveler of Maple. I've traveled just about any place where my eyes can reach and now I am just exhausted. Just let me rest in peace...

#L0##bOk, I was just passing by.#k#l
#L1##bI just had a question about...#k#l

Wait, what are you holding on your hand? Isn't that #bBob's snail shell#k? Why are you holding it! Let me see him!

#L0##bAlright, chill please. Here you go.#k#l
#L1##bNo way! Why should I?#k#l
Ok... You'd better have explanation for this one.
Sorry. Leave me alone for now...
What have you done with him! You should be ashamed of yourself for this!
Talk to me in a minute! (Intensely looks at the snail shell)
How did this happen? How come there is this huge scar on his Shell? Are you responsible for this?!\r\n\r\n#L0##bNo, not that scar. I'm just... asked to bring him somewhere. That's all.#k#l

I see... Poor guy... Now that I look at it, doesn't look like this scar is fresh... No one really realizes how important his being is in this cynical world. Hope you realize that.\r\n\r\n#L0##bI get it. 100%. Crystal Clear. Won't happen again. I promise.#k#l

Understood. You know, he's the one who helped me getting out of that Drake's Meal Table when I got hurt... I could have gone out there by myself but I still admire his bravery and passion for doing such a thing for a human being as a snail.\r\n\r\n#L0##bOh.. that's what happened.#k#l
I guess your intention wasn't all that bad after all. Let me get you something. Talk to me in a minute while I get them.
This isn't really much but for Bob, I'd give him anything without any hesitation. Hope you take good care of him while your trip.
Also, don't give him to anyone suspicious if their intentions are unknown. Bob is a legend among people who know him and I bet lots of people would want him for whatever reason for all we know.
Sorry. Leave me alone for now...
